org.xbill.DNS
Class SetResponse

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xbill.DNS.SetResponse
public class SetResponse
extends Object

The Response from a query to Cache.lookupRecords() or Zone.findRecords()

See Also:
Cache, Zone

Method Summary
 RRset[] answers()
          If the query was successful, return the answers
 Vector backtrace()
          If the query involved CNAME traversals, return a Vector containing all CNAMERecords traversed.
 boolean isNegative()
          Is the answer to the query conclusively negative?
 boolean isNODATA()
          Is the answer to the query that the data does not exist?
 boolean isNXDOMAIN()
          Is the answer to the query that the name does not exist?
 boolean isPartial()
          Did the query partially succeed?
 boolean isSuccessful()
          Was the query successful?
 boolean isUnknown()
          Is the answer to the query unknown?
 CNAMERecord partial()
          If the query was partially successful, return the last CNAME found in the lookup process.
 String toString()
          Prints the value of the CacheResponse
